# dkanClientTools

TypeScript monorepo for DKAN data catalog integration. Framework-agnostic core with React and Vue adapters built on TanStack Query.

## Project Guidance

- Quick reference: /PROJECT_INFO.md
- Comprehensive guidance: /CLAUDE.md
- Global AI preferences: ~/.claude/CLAUDE.md

## Core Documentation

- Architecture: /docs/ARCHITECTURE.md
- API reference: /docs/API_REFERENCE.md
- Build process: /docs/BUILD_PROCESS.md
- Development: /docs/DEVELOPMENT.md
- Installation: /docs/INSTALLATION.md
- Patterns: /docs/reference/PATTERNS.md

## Framework Guides

- React integration: /docs/REACT_GUIDE.md
- Vue integration: /docs/VUE_GUIDE.md
- Drupal integration: /docs/DRUPAL_INTEGRATION.md

## Packages

### Core Package
- Location: /packages/dkan-client-tools-core
- README: /packages/dkan-client-tools-core/README.md
- Testing: /packages/dkan-client-tools-core/TESTING.md
- API client: /packages/dkan-client-tools-core/src/api/client.ts
- Types: /packages/dkan-client-tools-core/src/types.ts

### React Package
- Location: /packages/dkan-client-tools-react
- README: /packages/dkan-client-tools-react/README.md
- Testing: /packages/dkan-client-tools-react/TESTING.md
- Example hook: /packages/dkan-client-tools-react/src/useDataset.ts
- Example test: /packages/dkan-client-tools-react/src/__tests__/useDataset.test.tsx

### Vue Package
- Location: /packages/dkan-client-tools-vue
- README: /packages/dkan-client-tools-vue/README.md
- Test summary: /packages/dkan-client-tools-vue/TEST_SUMMARY.md
- Example composable: /packages/dkan-client-tools-vue/src/useDataset.ts
- Example test: /packages/dkan-client-tools-vue/src/__tests__/useDataset.test.ts

## External Dependencies Documentation

- DKAN platform: /docs/external/platforms/DKAN.md
- DKAN API: /docs/external/platforms/DKAN_API.md
- TanStack Query: /docs/external/libraries/TANSTACK_QUERY.md
- Data standards: /docs/external/standards/DATA_STANDARDS.md
- TypeScript: /docs/external/frameworks/TYPESCRIPT.md
- React hooks: /docs/external/frameworks/REACT_HOOKS.md
- Vue Composition API: /docs/external/frameworks/VUE_COMPOSITION_API.md

## Examples

- React demo: /examples/react-demo-app
- Vue demo: /examples/vue-demo-app

## Key Directories

- Source packages: /packages
- Documentation: /docs
- External docs: /docs/external
- Build scripts: /scripts
- DKAN development site: /dkan

## Common Commands

```bash
npm run build:all    # Build packages, deploy, examples
npm run dev          # Watch mode
npm test             # All tests
npm run typecheck    # Type checking
```

See /docs/DEVELOPMENT.md for complete command reference.
